productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #56,452 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #58 in Women's Fur & Faux Fur Jackets & Coats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to get this jacket but when it came , first off took way to long to here, opened it up and it was light as a feather , from that point I knew it wasn’t going to be good , it looks like an old raggy robe , way way to big and it was a recommended size for me , and lastly the quality of this jacket or whatever it is called is simply awful .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This is surprisingly warm and very soft. It is cheap and definitely looks cheap though so just be aware. I got the camel with no buttons. Pretty color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This purchase is perhaps the worse thing I’ve ever purchased from Amazon. It doesn’t look like the picture. The pockets stick out on both sides making it appear you might have two protruding fat sacks on your stomach. The material is the stuff you might find in a super cheap stuffed animal that you won at a carnival . Someone here suggested that they would just use it as a robe… not me! It is presented as a coat not a robe. I did request a refund and got it. I gave it one star, because I couldn’t give it less than one. Someone said here, you get what you pay for as it is so cheap, like $18.00… no it’s not worth $18.00 it was good for a laugh, my husband laughed his head off when I modeled it for him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Coat to thin and not heavy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft brown coat
reviews.reviewText: Soft long nice but to thin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wish I’d read reviews before purchasing. Cheap price, cheap product. NOT a coat at all. It’s a bathrobe. Thin, poorly made. So disappointed, but don’t want to pay to send it back to China where it came from. So, I have a junk bathrobe to do housework in now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Warm and fuzzy to wear.Just loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not a coat
reviews.reviewText: Very soft material however I thought I was purchasing a coat but it’s more like a bathrobe. Very thin and not at all like pictured. I can only wear it as a robe. Very disappointed
